item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II ‘Anniversary’ update launches September 4
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Year 2 updates schedule detailed.

Publisher Focus Entertainment and developer Saber Interactive will release the “Anniversary” update for third-person action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II on September 4, the companies announced.

The update will add a new player-versus-environment mission, new player-versus-player modes “Helbrute Onslaught” and “Stratagems,” a new player-versus-player arena, three new weapons, Majoris enemy “Chaos Spawn,” and the “Chaos Armour Pack.” Season Pass II content “Black Templars Champion Pack” and “Imperial Fists Cosmetic Pack” will also be available.

The companies also announced the game’s “Year 2” updates schedule:

  • Patch 10 (September 4, 2025)
    • Free Updates
      • New player-versus-environment mission
      • New player-versus-player modes “Helbrute Onslaught”
      • New player-versus-player arena
      • New player-versus-player modes “Stratagems”
      • Three new weapons
      • Majoris enemy “Chaos Spawn”
      • “Chaos Armour Pack”
    • Season Pass II
      • “Black Templars Champion Pack
      • “Imperial Fists Cosmetic Pack”
  • Patch 11 (Q4 2025)
    • Free Updates
      • New player-versus-environment mission
      • New mission pickups
      • Stratagems: New rewards and battlefield conditions
    • Season Pass II
      • “Blood Angels Champion Pack”
      • “Salamanders Cosmetic Pack”
  • Patch 12 (Q1 2026)
    • Free Updates
      • New player-versus-environment mission
      • Techmarine Class
      • Techmarine Weapon “Omnissiah Axe”
      • Battle-Barge expansion
      • Stratagems: New battlefield conditions
    • Season Pass II
      • “Raven Guard Champion Pack”
      • “Carcharodons Cosmetic Pack”
  • Patch 13 (Q1 2026)
    • Free Updates
      • New player-versus-environment mission
      • New Terminus Enemy
      • Progression Update
    • Season Pass II
      • “Iron Hands Chapter Pack”
  • Patch 14 (Q2 2026)
    • Free Updates
      • Two new player-versus-player arenas
      • Player-versus-player Stratagems
      • Stratagems: New rewards
    • Season Pass II
      • “///redacted/// Champion Pack”
      • “Raptors Cosmetic Pack”
  • Patch 15 (Q2 2026)
    • Free Updates
      • New Siege map
      • Stratagems: New rewards

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A reveals Mega Hawlucha
item.content:encoded:
• Switch
  • Switch 2

Mega Hawlucha spreads its wings.

Publisher The Pokemon Company and developer Game Freak have released a new trailer and a wrestling match-style video for Pokemon Legends: Z-A introducing Mega Hawlucha, a new Mega-Evolved Pokemon making its debut.

Here is the Pokemon’s official description:

Mega Hawlucha

  • Category: Wrestling Pokemon​
  • Type: Fighting / Flying
  • Height: 3’3″ (1 m)
  • Weight: 55.1 lbs. (25 kg)

Bulked up by Mega Evolution, it uses its muscles to take hit after hit from opponents’ moves and flex its own strength. After luring its opponent into attacking, it retaliates to make them flinch before diving at them using its signature move, Flying Press, to aim for victory.

The Pokemon Company also announced that it has partnered with Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre (CMLL) to host a special event at Arena Mexico in Mexico City on September 25, 2025 at 6:00 p.m. PT, featuring four exhibition matches with top lucha libre wrestlers, Mistico. Tickets will be available soon via Ticketmaster.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A is due out for Switch 2 and Switch on October 16. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Ys Memoire: Revelations in Celceta coming west in early 2026
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

The Switch version of Ys: Memories of Celceta.

XSEED Games and Marvelous Europe will release Ys Memoire: Revelations in Celceta for Switch in the west in early 2026, the publisher announced.

Ys Memoire: Revelations in Celceta first launched for Switch on May 22 in Japan. It is a port of Ys: Memories of Celceta, previously released for PlayStation 4, PC via Steam, and PS Vita, with newly arranged versions of all in-game background music.

A physical Day One Edition will be available for $59.99 via the Marvelous USA Online Store and at participating retailers. It includes a copy of the game, a 3D acrylic keychain / diorama set, a two-disc original soundtrack with 36 tracks, a set of five art cards featuring characters from the game, and a 21 inches-by-24 inches cloth map of Celceta, all housed within a specially illustrated outer box.

Here is an overview of the game, via XSEED Games:

About

World-famous adventurer Adol Christin awakens alone in the unfamiliar land of Celceta, remembering nothing more than his own name. Eager to unravel the mystery of his past and his current predicament, Adol begins his search for clues to his identity in a nearby town. Joined by the thief, Duren, who claims to have spent some time at his side these past weeks, the young adventurer soon earns the favor of the local Romun Army general. The general tasks the duo with documenting the untamed wilderness of the Great Forest of Celceta. Though none have ever returned from this dangerous quest, Adol sets off with Duren in hopes of reclaiming his lost memories. Along the way he meets numerous other individuals who seem to have encountered him before and must carefully determine who among them can be trusted.

Experience a timeless chapter in the storied RPG franchise making its debut on Nintendo Switch, filled with duplicitous schemes, treacherous geography, and secretive characters. As the adventure that immediately follows the events of Ys X: Nordics, and which laid the groundwork for gameplay systems that would be seen in Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA and beyond, Ys Memoire: Revelations in Celceta is a special opportunity to go deeper into the series’ history and see the evolution that continues to drive its remarkable longevity. Explore and map out your way across a dangerous landscape, taking advantage of a unique tag-team party combat system that allows for creativity and strategy. Seek the truth of Adol’s past against the musical backdrop of a refreshed soundtrack. Re-awaken the spirit of adventure, exclusively on Nintendo Switch, in Ys Memoire: Revelations in Celceta.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Exhilarating Party-Based Action – Strategic party battles challenge players to change their tactics on the fly, and allies can pick up new abilities in the midst of battle that can help them gain the advantage against powerful enemies.
  • Dynamic Exploration of a Dangerous Land – Celceta is a vast and mysterious land, filled with interesting people and thrilling adventures. Players can take advantage of a robust mapping system as they discover all the challenges and rewards that await.
  • Enhanced Musical Experience – The sweeping score guiding Adol’s journey through Celceta returns, along with a newly recorded, re-interpreted version, allowing players to choose their own auditory adventure.

item.title: RGG Summit 2025 set for September 24
item.content:encoded:
Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio updates incoming.

Publisher SEGA and developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio will host RGG Summit 2025 on September 24 at 12:00 JST, the companies announced.

The broadcast will feature the latest information from Yakuza / Like a Dragon series developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio.

An “RGG Direct” will follow directly after RGG Summit 2025 with a deeper dive into the announcements.

RGG Summit 2024 featured the announcement of Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii. This year’s edition will likely feature updates on STRANGER THAN HEAVEN and possibly the new Virtua Fighter project.
